entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 2:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
